params.owner: Address to check withdrawal limit for

returns._0: Maximum amount that can be withdrawn

returns.actualAmount: Actual USDC withdrawn (may differ due to fees/slippage)

currentAPY().notice: Get current APY of the strategy

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit USDC into the underlying protocol

maxWithdraw(address).notice: Get maximum withdrawable amount for an owner

totalAssets().notice: Get total USDC value held by this strategy

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw USDC from the underlying protocol
